name: SemanticTagType
desc: A compilation of data object types for semantic tags.

items.name: currencyAmount
items.desc: An object that represents an amount of money and type of currency.

items.name: location
items.desc: An object that represents the coordinates of a location.

items.name: personNameComponents
items.desc: An object that represents the parts of a personâ€™s name.

items.name: seat
items.desc: An object that represents the identification of a seat for a transit journey or an event.

items.name: wifiNetwork
items.desc: An object that contains information required to connect to a WiFi network.
